title: Commission Directive 83/131/EEC of 14 March 1983 amending the Annex to Council Directive 79/117/EEC prohibiting the placing on the market and use of plant protection products containing certain active substances
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 14 March 1983
amending the Annex to Council Directive 79/117/EEC prohibiting the placing on the market and use of plant protection products containing certain active substances
(83/131/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall, not later than 1 October 1984, bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 March 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 33, 8. 2. 1979, p. 36.
